mapper.insert: insert into poly_employee(employee_no, employee_name, password, department_id, enabled, gmt_create, gmt_modified) values (#{employeeNo}, #{employeeName}, #{password}, #{departmentId}, #{enabled}, #{gmtCreate}, #{gmtModified})
mapper.select: select e.*, r.id,r.name from poly_employee e, poly_employee_role er, poly_role r where e.`employee_no`=#{employeeNo} and e.`id` = er.`eid` and er.`rid` = r.`id`
mapper.delete: delete poly_employee, poly_employee_role from poly_employee left join poly_employee_role on poly_employee.`id`=poly_employee_role.`eid` where id = #{id}
